column1: Uchi////Our waiter then came by afterwards and then lightly flicked a $25 gift card on the table as if he was playing cards. His last comment to us was "you'll be using that tomorrow
column2: right?" Those are one of those comments that are not a direct punch in the face
column4: you're kind of left thinking did I just drop close to $400 for dinner excluding his tip to be told passive aggressive comments from the waiter.
